context_of_use: This use case allows doctors to create prescriptions and patients to request new or renewed prescriptions through the system.
stakeholders_and_interests: doctor: Provide appropriate medication to patients.
description: Create prescriptions and handle patient requests for new or renewed prescriptions through the system.
triggering_event: A doctor or patient initiates a prescription management action.
preconditions: The doctor is logged into the system.
The patient is logged into the system.
postconditions: A prescription is created by the doctor.
A prescription request is submitted by the patient.
assumptions: The system allows doctors to write prescriptions.
The system allows patients to request prescriptions.
requirements_met: The system shall allow doctors to write prescriptions for patients.
The system shall allow patients to request new prescriptions.
outstanding_issues: Clarification on how prescription requests are processed.
main_flow: 1. Doctor writes a prescription → System saves the prescription.
2. Patient requests a new prescription → System records the request.
alternative_flows: AF-1 (from Step 2): If the patient requests a prescription on a mobile device, the system processes the request similarly.
